reviews.text:
The service was very good. The employees and boss were both nice. The environment is with local style and history. The location is not far from the church, it‚Äôs convenient.

But, it‚Äôs a bit over priced. A starter and main course costs 30 euro which was exactly the price I paid in a 5 start hotel.

Plus, the meat is not fresh. I ordered ‚Äúgrandfather‚Äôs pan‚Äù, the chicken was dry, the beef was not fresh(I tasted it but didn‚Äôt eat), the pork was good.

I wouldn‚Äôt recommend this restaurant.

Konoba Didov San in Zagreb offered a pleasant dining experience, earning a solid 4 out of 5 stars.

I had the Schnitzel with potatoes, and it was good‚Äîwell-cooked and satisfying, just what I was looking for. The dish was hearty and flavorful, making for a comforting meal.

The service was friendly, with the staff making sure we felt welcome and taken care of throughout our visit. The interior of the restaurant was very cozy, adding to the overall warmth of the experience. It‚Äôs the kind of place where you can relax and enjoy a good meal in a comfortable setting.

In the middle of a quiet old town, we visited this gem. The group enjoyed Grandma's chicken & cabbage filled with meat and vegetarian risetto. As starters we shared deep fried donuts with cheese and strukli. We started with a bottle of Croatian beer. Everything including drinks, starters & main dishes were very satisfying. Generous portion accompanied by bread. The staff was very helpful and candid. Combination of nice stroll and this setting made it a nicely spent evening. Good job and thanks to the full team giving a good experience to the guests..

What a pleasant restaurant in central Zagreb. They get busy, so I would recommend a reservation (or come early). The food s very good and the service is very friendly. The grilled squid is excellent and the preparation with potatoes and chard was wonderful. They also have amazing Traverica and a pleasant ambiance,

Great local food, this is one of the best spots we enjoyed in Croatia. We did eat the whole place! We were so hungry and the smell was so nice that we forgot to take more pics  üòÖ Stop by, really recommended!
